Welcome to my first blog post! In this tutorial, I’ll walk you through how I created this data blog using [Quarto](https://quarto.org), [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/), and [PyCharm](https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/).

## What You’ll Need

Before you begin, make sure you have the following installed:
- [Python](https://www.python.org/)
- [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/download/)
- A GitHub account and basic familiarity with Git

## Tools I Used

- **PyCharm Community Edition** (free)
- **GitHub Pages** (free)
- **ChatGPT** (for guidance and troubleshooting)
